item.description:
Same owners as Libby's on Wooster Street in New Haven.

Awesome Italian pastry and great coffee.

Come out and join us.

310 Washington Avenue North Haven, Ct  (203) 234-2530

item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the first table with a Meetup Sign
